text: Hey babe, look at this email we got.
It's from Nikki, the famous producer. She's offering us the chance to compete for the best studio.
Wow, that's amazing! But what does it mean exactly?
Well, we have to keep producing great content, and then Nikki will pick the best studio based on popularity, quality, and profitability.
Sounds like a lot of pressure. But also very exciting. Let's do it!
